name: Adriana Voncina
body:
#Adriana Voncina

    8424 26th Ave SW, Apt A, Seattle, WA, 98106

    C: (206) 291-8215 E: avoncina@msn.com

    Skills:

  • French (Fluent), Portuguese (Fluent), Japanese (Basic), Spanish (Basic), German (Basic)

  • Time management, organization, prioritization, attention to detail

  • Strong Interpersonal and communication skills

  • Microsoft Office (Advanced)

    Professional Experience:

    Amazon TRMS Investigations Specialist (Buyer Risk Investigations), Seattle, WA

    08/2014-present

  • Investigator for multiple marketplaces including Amazon Business to Business (B2B), North American marketplace (NA), Amazon Wireless (Wireless), Amazon France (FR), Amazon Brazil (BR)

  • Responsibilities include analysis of risk indicators to prevent fraud while maintaining SLA’s and following SOP’s

  • Named Investigator of the Month (August 2015)

  • Initiated and participated in pilot projects to improve departmental tools and customer experience.

    Events Recruiting Coordinator, Amazon Kindle, Seattle, WA

    08/2013- 07/2014 (contracted through Collabera Inc.)

  • Event Coordinator for Kindle Content and Device Teams.

  • Program managed three international events (Tel- Aviv, Stockholm, and Santiago) as well as several local, domestic, and diversity hiring events.

  • Helped spearhead diversity-recruiting efforts in the Kindle Organization through event coordination, data analysis, and candidate engagement.

  • Created a process document for Purchase Order creation.

  • Managed Amazon wide recruiting event calendar for 2013 – 2014 by collaborating with department heads regarding recruiting policies.

    Randstad Sourceright (Microsoft Staffing) Interview Scheduler, Renton, WA

    02/2013 to 08/2013

  • Scheduled candidates throughout the interview process, from recruiter’s initial review to offer-stage.

  • Acted as liaison between candidates and Microsoft hiring teams

  • Scope of responsibility included direct support for several Microsoft teams: IEB (Interactive Entertainment Business) group and WWLD (Windows/ Windows Live Division)

    Other Experience:

    Helzberg Diamonds: 10/2009 to 03/2010,

    Apple Retail Store Specialist: 09/2011 to 02/2013

    Education:

    University of Washington, Seattle, WA – BA Political Science (12/2012)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
